job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
**Must be local to Phoenix or willing to relo – remote until at least October**


Must Haves:

-3-5 years’ experience with Python or Java development and an emphasis in Machine Learning (R, mathematical modeling, statistics)

-Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field

-Hands on experience with libraries such as Spark, Splunk, Pandas, NumPy, or Sickit-learn

-Strong understanding and experience having worked in a Linux environment

-3-5 years’ experience in building and integrating APIs


Plusses:

-Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field

-Background in Linux administration

-Knowledge of WebSphere, JBose, or NodeJS

 

Day-To-Day:

An employer in North Phoenix is looking for a Python/Machine Learning Engineer to join their team. This individual will be on the Site Reliability Team in which they are in charge of mission critical applications that are used by millions for a client facing financial website. This individual should be comfortable working in an environment with strict performance requirements and be confident in their python and understanding of machine learning. This team is working to implement an “Automation First” approach in the SRE space. This engineer should have an understanding and be able to architect and conceptualize critical applications in a machine learning space.
